S

save() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This saves the game when the player selects this action in the method GameEngine.playerTurn().
sc - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.UserInterface
 
selectAction(boolean) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.UserInterface
this method takes in the boolean @param outerMenu which when set to true, displays the outerMenu which prints the options for the player to move, shoot, look, check Stats, debug, save, or quit, and asks for the user input for which option the user wants to pick, and if the UserInterface.isDebugMode is true, it will display the extra option to display the key.
selectDirection() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.UserInterface
In this method, UserInterface.invalidInput is set to true, it runs, displaying the options for choosing direction and @return int value which is plug into the game engine
setBriefCase() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method sets GameEngine.brief on GameEngine.theMap in one of the nine rooms.
setDifficulty() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.UserInterface
this method prints and asks the user if he wants to play on hard difficulty or not by asking for input using UserInterface.sc.
setEffect() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.PowerUp
This method contains the effects of the items once the player encounters them.
setEnemies() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method ensures that the enemies, GameEngine.theNinja, are properly placed on GameEngine.theMap.
setItems() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method makes GameEngine.theItem spawn into an array of three.
setPlayerVision(boolean, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method uses the boolean look and int direction to create the appropriate vision.
setPosition(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This method sets the position of the objects.
setPossibleRC(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This method sets the possible positions of the object.
setUp() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method displays the welcome text and the game menu.
setVision() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method sets the darkness of the building.
spawnCol - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
This field represents the column that the Enemy is spawned into, used in Enemy.spawnEnemy().
spawnEnemy() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
This method actually places the enemies in their spawn point, with the Enemy.spawnRow saving getPossibleRow() and Enemy.spawnCol saving getPossibleCol().
spawnItem() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.PowerUp
After ensuring that the PowerUp.possibleRowSpawn and PowerUp.possibleColSpawn are empty through the GameEngine class, this saves the items' positions, setting PowerUp.itemRow and PowerUp.itemCol.
spawnPossibleLocation() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
This method randomly creates locations in which the enemy may be spawned at.
spawnPossibleLocation() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.PowerUp
This method locates possible spawn locations for the items.
spawnRow - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
This field represents the row that the Enemy is spawned into, used in Enemy.spawnEnemy().
